医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
裸蛤——明天的更可持续食物来源的答案？研究人员将特雷迪尼类动物评估为一种潜在的营养丰富且可持续的未来食物来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Naked-clams-e28093-tomorrows-answer-for-a-more-sustainable-food-source.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Naked-clams-e28093-tomorrows-answer-for-a-more-sustainable-food-source.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b941de-636a-42f5-a9f6-d789fd2b64dc Thu, 23 Nov 2023 07:19:00 -0500 Naked clams – tomorrow's answer for a more sustainable food source?
询问朋友：青少年更喜欢咨询同龄人中社交相似的成员最近的一项研究强调了青少年如何积极咨询社交网络成员以获取信息，这反驳了之前认为年轻人被动受到同伴压力影响的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Asking-a-friend-Adolescents-prefer-to-consult-socially-similar-members-of-their-peer-group.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Asking-a-friend-Adolescents-prefer-to-consult-socially-similar-members-of-their-peer-group.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d5c82d8-5de3-45bd-911c-9d65b0680d65 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 06:57:00 -0500 Asking a friend: Adolescents prefer to consult socially similar members of their peer group
镰状细胞病患者和疾病缓解治疗的使用新的疾病缓解治疗 (DMT)，即 crizanlizumab、L-谷氨酰胺和 voxelotor 最近已获得批准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Sickle-Cell-Disease-患者-and-the-use-of-disease-modifying-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Sickle-Cell-Disease-患者-and-the-use-of-disease-modifying-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53f20ec1-4eef-402e-8edd-00e721fea684 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 06:44:00 -0500 Sickle Cell Disease patients and the use of disease-modifying treatments
新研究表明患有心血管疾病的成年人的癌症风险增加与较高的体重指数有关CVD/T2D 和 BMI 与癌症风险的联合和个体相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-study-reveals-increased-cancer-risk-linked-to-higher-BMI-in-adults-with-cardioangio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-study-reveals-increased-cancer-risk-linked-to-higher-BMI-in-adults-with-cardioangio-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=203ed876-9d33-4ced-b8ae-5d67048e4882 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 06:14:00 -0500 New study reveals increased cancer risk linked to higher BMI in adults with cardiovascular diseases
探索交叉点：美国阿尔茨海默病患者的心血管死亡率趋势研究人员将阿尔茨海默病患者与美国普通人群心血管疾病相关死亡率的趋势进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Exploring-the-intersection-Cardioangio-mortality-trends-among-Alzheimere28099s-病人-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Exploring-the-intersection-Cardioangio-mortality-trends-among-Alzheimere28099s-病人-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b884e77d-d4aa-42c2-997a-d739bbd2440e Thu, 23 Nov 2023 06:00:00 -0500 Exploring the intersection: Cardiovascular mortality trends among Alzheimer’s patients in the U.S.
优化医院患者安全：机器学习模型增强预警系统性能研究人员提出了一种基于机器学习的新型预测模型，用于早期预测不良事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Optimizing-hospital- Patient-safety-Machine-learning-model-enhances-early-warning-system-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Optimizing-hospital- Patient-safety-Machine-learning-model-enhances-early-warning-system-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57e2353e-1433-45f4-b5ca-060abd9c6e5e Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:52:00 -0500 Optimizing hospital patient safety: Machine learning model enhances early warning system performance
关于患者-外科医生性别一致性和术后死亡率的新见解《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项美国大型研究发现，无论男性或女性外科医生为男性还是女性患者进行手术，大手术后的死亡率相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-insights-into-病人-外科医生-性别-concordance-and-post-surgical-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/New-insights-into-病人-外科医生-性别-concordance-and-post-surgical-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f22a132a-8784-4780-b034-c743b363cba6 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:35:00 -0500 New insights into patient-surgeon gender concordance and post-surgical mortality
首次感染前接种 COVID-19 疫苗可降低长期感染新冠病毒的风险《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究发现，在第一次感染前至少接种一剂 covid-19 疫苗与降低发生 covid-19 后病症（通常称为长期 covid）的风险密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/COVID-19-vaccination-before-first-infection-may-reduce-risk-of-developmenting-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/COVID-19-vaccination-before-first-infection-may-reduce-risk-of-developmenting-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93c7a068-b510-4825-9a5c-9f17af844c54 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:27:00 -0500 COVID-19 vaccination before first infection may reduce risk of developing long COVID
研究表明盲人可以通过声音识别面孔乔治城大学医学中心的神经科学家和同事使用一种将图像转换为声音的专用设备表明，盲人使用大脑中称为梭形面部区域的部分来识别基本面孔，该区域对于处理面部表情至关重要。有视力的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Blind-people-can-recognize-faces-using-sound-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Blind-people-can-recognize-faces-using-sound-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f816e7a-e5a0-426a-95f0-0d8d6083a25a Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:22:12 -0500 Blind people can recognize faces using sound, study shows
麻醉剂利多卡因可能具有抗癌特性宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的研究人员表示，利多卡因通常用作门诊医疗程序的麻醉剂，通过两种独特的机制激活某些苦味受体，从而导致癌细胞死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Numbing-agent-lidocaine-may-have-cancer-fighting-properties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Numbing-agent-lidocaine-may-have-cancer-fighting-properties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a385c58-d5de-4af5-9de4-a5d338e0520c Wed, 22 Nov 2023 22:15:07 -0500 Numbing agent lidocaine may have cancer-fighting properties
